Hyper Expert – New Pure NVMe plans, Cached SSD and Pure SSD – Out of brand new location!

cached ssd, Hyper Expert, kvm, new york, nvme, seattle, ssd December 5, 2019 @ 8:57 pm, by Frank Williams

Hyper Expert is back with more CRAZY deals! They just launched their New York location and are offering awesome discounts, on top of the very low priced KVM plans. They also introduced pure NVMe plans in addition to Cached SSD and Pure SSD.

See the many, many plans listed below that make up their New York VPS Sale. Here’s some additional information from Hyper Expert that makes these plans so special: Owned Hardware, Fully dedicated resources, Lowest priced KVM hosting, Enterprise class backend based on Red Hat Virtualization, Fully custom made user portal, 7 Days full refund no questions asked.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept Credit Card, Paypal and Bitcoin as payment methods.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Hyper Expert was established in the year 2015 by a small group of people that are very passionate about technology. We provide you with the best possible ways to make use of technology to improve your brand. The foundation of Hyper Expert is trust and honesty, with goal to provide the best customer experience to help clients generate revenue, reduce costs and transform their thinking. Hyper Expert serves as technology consultants and can also provide web services, colocation, and performance cloud hosted solutions.”

Here are the offers:
